Turn your single-family rental into multifamily

Apt takes care of the hassle of building a multifamily home  so you can get higher returns and increase property value.

Success! Our representative will reach out to you asap!

  • 1.Best use

    Apt designs a multifamily building that maximizes allowed use for your property and takes care of permitting.

  • 2.Risk free trial

    We form a joint venture once the permit is approved. While unlikely, there’s no loss for you if the permit’s declined.

  • 3.No extra cost

    Apt covers all upfront costs and secures financing for the project. You contribute the land you already own.

  • 4.Effortless construction

    Our team handles the entire process. You don’t have to lift a finger.

  • 5.Increased value

    You receive an increased cash flow from rentals, refinance, and eventual property sale.

  • Process

    • How does a typical project happen?
      • Introduction. First, we learn about your objectives and your property. We can evaluate your unique situation and present a development scenario.
      • Initial Agreement. Once you are comfortable with the proposal, we sign an agreement that covers the period until partnership formation and title transfer.
      • Design and Permitting. Apt invests at-risk capital to complete site surveys, design and permit the new development.
      • Partnership and Title Transfer. Once the project is fully entitled and permitted, we form a joint venture partnership to which you transfer your land.
      • Funding. Apt raises outstanding capital to develop the property.
      • Construction. Apt retains an experienced general contractor and oversees the construction of the building. Apt receives a development fee for successful project completion.
      • Operations. Apt oversees property management and distributes free cash to you, other capital partners, and a share to itself.
      • Sale. Apt coordinates the property sale after an agreed upon hold period.
    • How long does the permitting usually take?
      The permitting process may vary, in today’s conditions it may take 6 to 9 months for our typical project. You can keep receiving rental income in full while we permit the new building.
    • What is a by-right project?
      The permitting process may vary, in today’s conditions it may take 6 to 9 months for our typical project. You can keep receiving rental income in full while we permit the new building.
    • Can my neighbors stop the project?
      The permitting process may vary, in today’s conditions it may take 6 to 9 months for our typical project. You can keep receiving rental income in full while we permit the new building.
